history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions
USER public transit
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you public transit directions or driving directions
USER driving
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER UPMC Presby
TTS Okay, going to upmc presbyterian. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you wanna leave from?
USER CMU
TTS Okay, leaving from carnegie mellon university. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER now
TTS Okay, travelling at 04:15 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> Ok, great! <break strength='strong' /> Feel free to ask me to repeat a step, <break strength='weak' /> if you didn't catch it the first time. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 5 minutes. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER can you can you
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 3 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 5 minutes. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head north on Morewood avenue toward Fifth avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> <break strength='weak' /> Let me know when you are ready for the next step. </speak>
USER Next Step
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn left onto Fifth avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER next
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue straight to stay on Fifth avenue. Pass by Starbucks . . </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Lothrop Street </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I proceed? </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Turn right at Victoria Street Destination will be on the left. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Please tell me when it's ok to continue. </speak>
USER continue
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER no
TTS <speak> Do you need further directions to a particular doctor's office?
USER yes
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will help you to find a doctor's office. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is the doctor's full name?
USER David Hamilton
TTS <speak> I found david hamilton's office to be <break strength='strong' /> Suite A-402 at <break strength='weak'/> Department of Neurological Surgery <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
